TopicTitle: WARNING!: invalid certificate reported by Opera

Articles.Content:
I just had an invalid security certificate warning pop up from Opera when I clicked on my bookmark to this site.

I am not dreadfully worried. but it needs checking by the site admin team.
I get no such issues on Chrome, Edge, or Firefox. If you get many of those it would probably be a good idea to run a virus scan.
Squad are using a certificate from GoDaddy, so I'm not surprised Opera is complaining...

Seems to be working OK now.

Good point there about running a virus check. Thanks.
